titles: The Newe Testament dylygently corrected and compared with the Greke by Willyam Tindale, and fynesshed in the yere of our Lorde God A.M.D. & xxxiiij. in the moneth of Nouember.
author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
notes: Revised ed. of Tyndale's New Testament of 1525--Cf. Brit. and for. Bible soc. Hist. cat. no. 5.
Frontispiece portrait of Tyndale opposite t.p.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
